meaningMnemonic: Something made of <radical>gold</radical> <radical>stand</radical>s in a <radical>village</radical>. It's a <kanji>bell</kanji>!  The village bell.
readingMnemonic: The <kanji>bell</kanji> rings whenever the <reading>Shou</reading>gun (しょう) arrives in the village. Its ringing echoes throughout the entire village so everyone knows they have to come out and pay their respects.
